instructions:
Cook the pasta in boiling salted water following package directions until tender. Drain and rinse with cold water.
In a large bowl, combine cooked pasta, celery, green and red bell peppers and red onion.
In a small bowl, mix together the mayonnaise, Italian dressing, and Old Bay. Pour into pasta; mix well. Stir in the shrimp. Chill 2 hours if desired. Sprinkle with additional Old Bay just before serving, if desired.
title: Old Bay® Lady Liberty Seafood Salad
